questions.paragraph: What are the main parts of the plant?
A farmer found seeds that don't belong in his farm. What is the reason for that?
popup: This is due to the dispersal of seeds by wind, living organisms, or water.

questions.paragraph: What happens to the leaves of a plant, if they are placed in a dark place for a long time?
If plants do not exist on the Earth, what will happen to living organisms?
popup: The oxygen necessary for respiration, and glucose as an energy source will not be available, leading to the death of living organisms and the end of life on the Earth.

questions.paragraph: Chlorophyll is very important to plants. Write the reason.
popup: It helps the plant absorb sunlight.

questions.paragraph: What will happen if the plant couldn't obtain carbon dioxide from the air?
popup: It will not be able to make its own food.

quizChooses.title: Answer the following
quizChooses.qtitle: Mention one function for each of the following

popup: They allow air to enter inside the plant.
They increase the absorption of water and nutrients from the soil.
Arteries carry blood that is rich with oxygen and glucose away from the heart to all body parts.
